scripts.setup: bun install && bun run setup:frontend && bun run setup:backend
scripts.dev: bun run clear && concurrently "cd frontend && bun run dev" "cd backend && bun run develop"
scripts.seed: cd backend && bun run strapi import -f ../seed-data.tar.gz
scripts.export: cd backend && bun run strapi export --no-encrypt -f ../seed-data
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
